text:
Hi I just installed tomcat 3.2.1 on linux. 
When I try to access the web page
http://10.3.1.2:8080/test/

produces the following messages in tomcat.log

2001-03-22 01:07:23 - ContextManager: Adding context Ctx( /examples )
2001-03-22 01:07:24 - ContextManager: Adding context Ctx( /admin )
2001-03-22 01:07:24 - ContextManager: Adding context Ctx( /test )

2001-03-22 01:07:35 - PoolTcpConnector: Starting HttpConnectionHandler on 8080
2001-03-22 01:07:35 - PoolTcpConnector: Starting Ajp12ConnectionHandler on 8007
2001-03-22 01:07:36 - PoolTcpConnector: Starting Ajp13ConnectionHandler on 8009

.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException:
        at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read(BufferedInputStream.java:118)
        at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read(BufferedInputStream.java:69)



Can you help


System Information

Linux Mandrake Corporate Server release 1.0.1 (Aegean)
Kernel 2.2.17-23mdk on an i586

[root@devel1 /root]# env | grep -i java
CLASSPATH=/usr/java/jdk1.3.0_02/lib/tools.jar:/usr/local/jar/mm.mysql-2.0.4-bin.
jar:.
JAVA_HOME=/usr/java/jdk1.3.0_02
PATH=/sbin:/usr/sbin:/bin:/usr/java/jdk1.3.0_02/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/X11R6/bin
